#summary Content related to Identity Module smartcards, as used in GSM and UMTS networks.

== Analysis Tools ==

  * A Python script for interfacing with UMTS USIM, and GSM SIM cards is available [http://ace-host.stuart.id.au/russell/files/python-pcsclite/examples/ here]

=== !CardPeek ===

  * Available for Linux, Mac OS X and Windows from [http://code.google.com/p/cardpeek Google Code]. Requires !LibLua 5.1+, and !AutoMake 1.10 for installation under Linux.

=== Dedicated Hardware/Wireshark Dissector ===

  * A Wireshark dissector, and information on hardware that can potentially be used to trace SIM card traffic from handsets is available, [http://bb.osmocom.org/trac/wiki/SIMtrace here]
